Activity: Arrive at work, log into the EHR system, and review any overnight updates or alerts. Prioritize emails from @qatest-1 and @qatest-2 regarding potential bugs or errors in the EHR system.

Participate in a brief team huddle to discuss strategies for improving the efficiency and accuracy of EHR data entry. Share best practices and address any recurring challenges encountered by the nursing staff.
Address the first patient for influenza symptoms, using the standardized protocols and EHR-integrated tools. Meticulously document all observations and patient responses directly into the EHR.
Enter patient data into the EHR for patients seen this morning, ensuring accuracy and completeness.
Assess the second patient for influenza symptoms, using the standardized protocols and EHR-integrated tools. Meticulously document all observations and patient responses directly into the EHR.
Lunch Break, browse the social media.
Address the third patient for influenza symptoms, using the standardized protocols and EHR-integrated tools. Meticulously document all observations and patient responses directly into the EHR.
Participate in a training session led by @trainer-1 on new features or updates to the EHR system related to influenza diagnosis and treatment. Focus on hands-on exercises to reinforce learning.
Address the fourth patient for influenza symptoms, using the standardized protocols and EHR-integrated tools. Meticulously document all observations and patient responses directly into the EHR.
Log out of the EHR system and prepare for departure.
